alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Dallas; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:37PM CDT until April 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR POLK...NORTHEASTERN CLARKE...SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS AND WARREN COUNTIES... At 736 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Johnston to near Norwalk to 8 miles southeast of Avenue Of The Saints Event Center, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Des Moines, West Des Moines, Ankeny, Urbandale, Johnston, Clive, Indianola, Altoona, Waukee, Norwalk, Pleasant Hill, Grimes, Windsor Heights, Carlisle, Bondurant, Saylorville, Mitchellville, Southridge Mall, Jordan Creek Town Center and Adventureland Amusement Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
